# Branding Assets

- `spark-banana-header.jpeg`: GitHub social preview ready image (`1280x640`, 2:1)
- `social-preview.jpeg`: alias of the same social preview image
- `spark-banana-header-original.jpeg`: original source from designer (`1456x720`)
- `spark-banana-header-cropped.jpeg`: intermediate cropped file (`1440x720`)
- `spark-banana-icon.png`: master icon (`1024x1024`)
- `spark-banana-icon-512.png`: resized icon (`512x512`)
- `spark-banana-icon-32.png`: small icon (`32x32`)
